prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Guitar, Drums, Organ, Bass, but without Synth Lead.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Guitar, Drums, Organ, Bass - but no Synth Lead.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Piano, Guitar, Drums, Organ, Bass - omitting the Synth Lead.

Style 3:
The instruments used in this song are Piano, Guitar, Drums, Organ, Bass - excluding the Synth Lead.
